The current market capitalisation stands at Rs 8,593.46 crore. The company management includes Malvinder Mohan Singh - Executive Chairman, Shivinder Mohan Singh - Executive Vice Chairman, Brian Tempest - Non Executive Director, Gurcharan Das - Non Executive Director, Harpal Singh - Non Executive Director, Joji Sekhon Gill - Non Executive Director, Pradeep Ratilal Raniga - Non Executive Director, Preetinder Singh Joshi - Non Executive Director, Sunil Godhwani - Non Executive Director, Udai Dhawan - Non Executive Director, Lynette Joy Hepburn Brown - Addnl.Non Exe.Independent Director, Ravi Umesh Mehrotra - Non Exe.Non Ind.Director, Shradha Suri Marwah - Addnl.Non Exe.Independent Director. It is listed on the BSE with a BSE Code of 532843 and the NSE with an NSE Code of FORTIS. Its Registered office is at Escorts Heart Institute and Research Cen Okhla Road, New Delhi,Delhi - 110025.
